decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (1301-01/KG Rev. A, 1301-02/KG Rev. A, 1301-03/KG Rev. B, 1301-04/KG, and 1301-05/KG Rev. A; received 12 January 2015) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - TThe access doorway to the premises shall have a minimum clear width of 900mm, a level surface or ramp between the pavement and the floor and a door handle of not more than 1m above ground level.

Condition : 5 - The use of the premises hereby approved shall only be for Class A2 uses only, with the exception of the use of the premises as a betting shop, which shall be prohibited.  

In respect of any of the above Class A2 uses hereby approved, notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, as amended, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification; the use shall not be changed to any other Use Class without further approval in writing from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The use of the ground floor shop hereby permitted (A2 use, excluding betting shop use) shall not be carried on outside the following times:

8:00am to 6:00pm on Mondays to Fridays
9:00am to 5:00pm on Saturdays
10:00am to 4:00pm on Sundays and Public Holidays
Condition : 7 - Notwithstanding the approved drawings, there shall be a maximum of three rooflights to the roof of the premises.
Condition : 8 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Change of use of existing storage unit to professional services use (A2) including installation of a shopfront
